>
[Ring of Maniacal Devices](/Equipment.aspx?ID=457)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 614 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This ring seems like simple tarnished brass, but it enhances your curiosity about traps and devices of all kinds. You can use an Interact action to pull a set of [thieves’ tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58) from the ring. These tools appear in your hand and fold back into the ring if they would leave your possession. They grant you a +2 item bonus to Thievery checks to Disable a Device and to Pick a Lock, and the ring’s insights grant you the same bonus to Crafting checks to Craft and Repair snares and traps.

<row gap="medium">

</row>

---

The ring grants a +3 bonus. Activating it creates an 8th-level _glyph of warding_ containing your choice of either [_prismatic spray_](/Spells.aspx?ID=233) or 7th-level _fireball_.
